title: Kirk Minihane Confronts His Stalker
description:
Kirk Minihane's cyber stalker Bob Murchison is escalating his tactics. In this one-hour monologue style episode, Minihane lays out the history of Murchison's obsession, what he's doing now, and how the Minifans will respond. Also, we found Fuller.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
